annotations.description: How to make a clarified milk punch cocktail - Milk clarification cocktail recipe#cocktail #drink #cocktailrecipeWatch David's videohttps://www.youtube.com/wa...
annotations.title: How to make a clarified milk punch cocktail - milk clarification cocktail recipe

textContent:
2 oz or 60 ml Plantation Pineapple rum
1 oz or 30 ml Rye
1 oz 0r 30 ml Cognac
1 oz or 30 ml Lime juice
3/4 oz or 22.5 ml Blueberry jam
1 tea spoon jasmin tea
2 oz or 60 ml Whole milk 

1- Mix all ingredients but the milk in a container and let infuse for 2 hours
2- In a second container, pour the milk
3- Pour your cocktail mixture over the milk to start the curdling process
4- Pour the cocktail over a coffee filter and wait one minute. The first drops will be cloudy. That's normal
5- Pour the cloudy drops over the unfiltered cocktail remaining in the filter
6- Wait until everything is filter and you are ready
Clarified milk punch cocktails will keep indefinitely in the fridge

https://youtu.be/VWS1li5Zrrs
title: The Social Distance
